summary:
I’m starting to worry that at this point nothing will make people happy.
I’ve always been in the camp of wanting communication...
body:
I’m starting to worry that at this point nothing will make people happy.

I’ve always been in the camp of wanting communication if not content, but what communication do we want? Because the most recent times that Phil actually communicated - explaining the truth bombs change and the 7 second challenge app being removed - everyone got either upset and angry about yet more joint content ending or upset and angry at the people upset and angry.

We’re still getting Phil content but from what I’ve seen, it’s falling quite short of being enough for most people, or people find it boring or underwhelming.

Practically every time Dan has posted in the last few months there’s some feud on here. When he posted a selfie, 75% of what I saw was people arguing over it. I’m honestly afraid of his next video upload because I fully expect some degree of fallout.

Everyone is upset when we don’t get content or communication, but everyone is upset when we do get content or communication. What does everyone want? Probably for pinof and joint videos and gaming videos and liveshows to come back and make is so these past few months never happened. Maybe we need to admit that many of us will never be fully happy with whatever this new era of Dan and Phil will be so long as we can’t let go of the past.

I don’t know how to make that better but I’m pretty damn sure that yelling at each other for their feelings, insulting another’s opinions or point of view, panicking and breaking down when we get what we want because it’s not what we expected, and focusing so much on negativity and upset that when Dan and Phil deliver we barely notice, is not the solution. It’s probably respecting people’s feelings, accepting that many things from the past will stay in the past, and being willing to either embrace this new era or leave if it just doesn’t make you happy anymore.

Dan and Phil have changed. It’s time that we try to as well.

blog.name: phandomgives
blog.title: Phandom Gives
blog.description: Group of Dan and Phil fans inspired to do more good in the world. DONATE NOW!  bit.ly/PG-Dan28 Please, contact via @PhandomGives on Twitter phandomgives.com

title: Phandom Creator Commissions Sign-up!
body:
For Dan’s 28th birthday drive we want to give the phandom’s wonderful creators an opportunity to showcase their talents through commissioned fanworks by donation to Young Minds.

Creator works include:

  • Fiction & Prose
  • Illustration & Graphic Art
  • Gifs
  • Graphics/Edits
  • Videos
  • Fanwork related services (beta reading, britpicking, etc.)

This is a way for creators who aren’t able to donate to contribute to the drive. Creators will be able to offer one or more works over as many forms of fanworks as they want, and specify the donation amount per commission. Creators will also be able to choose how they want their works to be commissioned (as in, first come, first serve, raffle etc).

We welcome all phandom creators, and the sign-up period starts today, May 26th, and closes on June 3rd.

CLICK HERE TO SIGN UP AS A PHANDOM CREATOR

summary: nostalgia time ‘cause they are on hiatus (146/?)
caption: nostalgia time ‘cause they are on hiatus (146/?)

reblog.comment: nostalgia time ‘cause they are on hiatus (146/?)

trail.content_raw: nostalgia time ‘cause they are on hiatus (146/?)
trail.content: nostalgia time ‘cause they are on hiatus (146/?)

body:
Dan, Phil, if you’re listening

Or reading? I know how to tumble. Anyway, Dan, there’s no pressure to upload, in June or otherwise, but we have been wondering if anything’s changed since we last heard anything definitive and I guess that’s why you tweeted, so thanks for keeping us in the loop where you can.

We know you’ve both needed the break and have reasons for not sharing eg there is no info, it’s just been a while now and we’ve seen a few changes that add up to feeling like a lot of endings - joint branding removed from Truth Bombs, the 7-second challenge app retired, both with minimal obvious info and no upfront explanation (this is what we’d really like as much as you can), plus the DnP shop sale. Some of us wonder whether we’ll be told one way or another whether you’ll return to gaming or other joint content.

Obvs you told us about things like the dapg hiatus, but not ending liveshows (I guess that was the only other concrete thing, but ig’s been quieter too which feels so different from last year), so we don’t know what else we’re not going to find out for certain and if we’re meant to be working it out somehow (eg hints in pinof 10 didn’t register since they were in the video and just seemed like cute references and, if we’d known beforehand, maybe we could have made it more special), and it’s like losing a friend. We try our best to understand and have patience, and plenty of us don’t mind at all, but to others it feels cold and not in line with how lovely last year was.

Sadly, it’s alienating people and not just shedding some who didn’t care as much, it’s also hurting a lot of those who have and starting to taint the good stuff. We don’t know if you’re aware of any or all of this, we can only guess. Anyway, needed to get this out there. Love you guys.

FRICKIN

HELP ME

AND I’VE LITERALLY MADE 5 DAN MOODBOARDS

summary: ok so i’m obviously quite hyped about the prospect of a june video, butttt i can’t help thinking that this might be a joke about...
body: ok so i’m obviously quite hyped about the prospect of a june video, butttt i can’t help thinking that this might be a joke about the last june video. i mean, he did the “i’m uploading” joke on april fools, and it would be a really big coincidence if he came back in june, one year after he said he’d (possibly) post a video. idk im just feeling a bit skeptical about getting my hopes up
